name: Dance
description: Fun dance workouts for the whole family. Get moving with music from around the world!

name: Yoga
description: Calming yoga sessions perfect for all ages, from toddler poses to senior stretches.

name: HIIT
description: High-intensity interval training adapted for families. Short bursts, big results!

name: Strength
description: Build strength together with bodyweight exercises suitable for every age group.

name: Sports
description: Practice sports skills together - from soccer drills to basketball fundamentals.

name: Outdoor
description: Take fitness outside! Nature walks, backyard games, and park workouts.

name: Cultural
description: Traditional games and exercises from cultures around the world.

name: Adaptive
description: Inclusive workouts designed for families with different abilities.
